    Message

    KSV Principles

    Company Line

    We create a new value through the practice of our “general principles regarding KISCO management quality” and provide you with the most appropriate information, materials, products, technologies.

    Philosophy

    KISCO produces genuine value by providing maximum satisfaction to our customer as a board-based provider of materials solutions that give due consideration to product quality, cost, and the environment.

    Our Mission

    Absolute value creation and corporate social responsibilities, creating best value for end-user and non-stopping innovation ourself, and services in order to improve your reliability, satisfaction and to create a prosperous future.

    Our Values

    1

    Vision

    We work hard everyday to make Kisco to become more valuable

    2

    Innovation

    Committed to sucessful innovation for both Kisco and our Customer

    3

    Integrity

    Having strong moral principles

    4

    Quality

    Quality is our top priority

    5

    Service

    Our goal is customer's satisfaction

    6

    Inspiration

    To become the best partner of our clients with solution
